## Exercises

Download exercises with 

```r
usethis::use_zip(
  "https://github.com/ddsjoberg/clinical-reporting-gtsummary-rmed/raw/main/exercises/exercises.zip",
  destdir = fs::path_home()
)
```

Solutions available [here](../exercises/solutions.html).
